data.eml:eml: Description of the first endemic Polistes Latreille, 1802 from Sulawesi (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Polistinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Selis, Marco (2018): Description of the first endemic Polistes Latreille, 1802 from Sulawesi (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Polistinae). Zootaxa 4508 (3): 435-438, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4508.3.7
